bibl.title: , ""All You Need is Love"": Some Thoughts on the Structure, Texture, and Meaning of the Brothers Song as well as on Its Relation to the Kypris Song (P.Sapph. Obbink).
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Linguistic and poetic structure of the Brothers Song. - The cultural texture of the Brothers Song. - The link between the Brothers Poem and the Kypris Poem. - Scenario and content of the Brothers Song. - The aesthetic and poetic dimension of the Brothers Song. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Anton Bierl, ""All You Need is Love"": Some Thoughts on the Structure, Texture, and Meaning of the Brothers Song as well as on Its Relation to the Kypris Song (P.Sapph. Obbink).

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 302-336.

P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Linguistic and poetic structure of the Brothers Song. - The cultural texture of the Brothers Song. - The link between the Brothers Poem and the Kypris Poem. - Scenario and content of the Brothers Song. - The aesthetic and poetic dimension of the Brothers Song. - Conclusion.
